column4: Anyone know of a legal video player that can play the "digital copy" cds that come with some dvds?  I have the original cd and its decryption key, just no way to play it... :(
it's defective by design I'm afraid. I doubt you'll find a legal player
Ah.  I see - better to "make a backup copy of the dvd" than attempt to legally play what I own.  Yep.  Defective by design
